00028 double som::random(double start, double end)
00029 {
00030     boost::uniform_real<> dist(start, end);
00031     return dist(twister);
00032 }
00033 
00039 som::node::node(const unsigned sample_size)
00040 {
00041     weights_.resize(sample_size);
00042     for (unsigned i = 0; i != sample_size; ++i)
00043     {
00044         weights_.insert_element(i, som::random(0.f,1.f));
00045     }
00046 }

00054 som::map::map(u_int size, u_int input_size, const boost::shared_ptr<som::abstract_distance>& distance)
00055     : distance_(distance)
00056 {
00057     sample_size_ = input_size;
00058     map_size_ = size;
00059     nodes_ = boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<som::node_ptr>(size, size);
00060 
00061     for (unsigned i = 0; i != map_size_; ++i)
00062     {
00063         for (unsigned j = 0; j != map_size_; ++j)
00064         {
00065             nodes_(i,j) = (boost::make_shared<som::node>(sample_size_));
00066         }
00067     }
00068 }
00069 
00076 som::node_ptr
00077 som::map::operator() (unsigned i, unsigned j)
00078 {
00079     return nodes_(i,j);
00080 }
00081 
00089 som::position
00090 som::map::get_bmu(boost::numeric::ublas::vector<double> &sample)
00091 {
00092     som::position p; // use this trick to avoid assignment of smart pointers (expensive copy)
00093     double min_distance = (*distance_)(nodes_(0,0)->get_weights(), sample);
00094     for (unsigned i = 0; i != map_size_; ++i)
00095     {
00096         for (unsigned j = 0; j != map_size_; ++j)
00097         {
00098             double distance = (*distance_)(nodes_(i,j)->get_weights(), sample);
00099             if (min_distance > distance)
00100             {
00101                 min_distance = distance;
00102                 p.x = i;
00103                 p.y = j;
00104             }
00105         }
00106     }
00107     return p;
00108 }
